system.requirement: When you take time to center yourself and chant the resonant and rhythmic sounds of...

abilities.description: Healing, roll +heart. On a strong hit, take both +1 health and +1 momentum. On a weak hit, choose only one to take.
Clarity, roll +heart. On a hit, you may immediately @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information}. If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Friendship with another person or community, roll +heart. On a hit, you may immediately @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond}. If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
